My goal is to grow into a Tech Lead role, combining technical vision, best practices, and strategic decision-making.

references.title: References
references.tagline: What my colleagues say about working with me.

reference.name: Jonathan Padin
reference.quote: I had the opportunity to work with Nicolas on several programming projects, and it was a very rewarding experience. He is a committed, responsible professional with an excellent attitude toward teamwork...

reference.name: Marína Briceño
reference.quote: Working with Nicolas Dume as the leader and Team Master for the Veterinary API project was a very positive experience. He stood out for his organizational skills, leadership, and clear communication with the team. He excelled at coordinating tasks, supporting the development process, and maintaining a great work environment, ensuring the project progressed in an orderly and efficient manner

reference.name: Andrea Belén Guinder Vichich
reference.quote: Working with Nicolás on our Mobile-First web project was a great experience. He has an incredible analytical capacity and a strong command of JavaScript. His ability to handle complex logic and data manipulation was essential for building such efficient and clean code

reference.name: Celeste Ruspil
reference.quote: I want to highlight and recommend Nicolás, with whom I shared two years in the Full Stack Web Development program. Throughout that time, he demonstrated not only high-level technical skills but also exceptional human qualities. He was always willing to help and mentor with patience, which made a key difference in my learning process.Thanks to his constant support, I was able to solidify fundamental concepts, improve my logic as a developer, and gain confidence. His collaborative attitude, commitment, and passion make him an outstanding professional and a great teammate. He undoubtedly adds immense value to any work environment.
